title: The Genius of Pixar's 'Soul' and 'Wonder Woman 1984' Backlash
description:
Sean and Amanda look at the early reactions to DC's latest film, which arrived on HBO Max on Christmas Day, and discuss what the ramifications could be to backlash against the film (0:43). Then, they discuss one of the year's best films, Pixar's 'Soul' (41:00).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
